TIDYPLOTS



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)
library(tidyplots)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
study |> 
  tidyplot(x = treatment, y = score, color = treatment) |> 
  add_mean_bar(alpha = 0.4) |> 
  add_sem_errorbar() |> 
  add_data_points_beeswarm() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
energy |> 
  tidyplot(x = year, y = energy, color = energy_source) |> 
  add_barstack_absolute() |> 
  adjust_legend_title("FUENTES DE ENERGÍA") |> 
  view_plot(title = "FUENTES DE ENERGÍA GLOBALES")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
energy_week |> 
  tidyplot(x = date, y = power, color = energy_source) |> 
  add_areastack_relative() |> 
  adjust_y_axis_title("PODER DE IMPACTO (%)") |>
  adjust_legend_title("FUENTES DE ENERGÍA") |> 
  view_plot(title = "FUENTES DE ENERGÍA GLOBALES - Septiembre 2023")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
